summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on January 22, 2010. The email contains a request for Staley to call Epstein when he gets up, and includes a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and intended only for the recipient.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a personal communication with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, suggesting a relationship with Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are in communication, indicating a personal or professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email was sent on January 22, 2010.
The email contains a request for Jes Staley to call Jeffrey Epstein.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email is prohibited.
The email includes a confidentiality notice indicating it is intended for the recipient only.
